name: F2H-3 Banshee
variantdescription: F2H-3 in service with the RCN. AIM-9B IRMs can be carried on the outer stations 1 and 8, no wing-tip FTs are used, and AtA refueling is not available.
loadnotes: Stations 3 and 4 and stations 5 and 6 are closely spaced. If a 500 lb bomb is carried on station 4 or 5, the adjacent station cannot be used.
